body:
Hi everyone. Now, you may be jealous but, I live in Oahu/Hawaii. Just out of curiousity, anyone else in the avicus community live in Hawaii? It's a small place and if there are other players, that would be awesome.

As of now, I believe we have had 5 unique members.
-TheShow808
-FLIP_PVP
-hell_no_808
-PokerFace_Legend
-seanfrogz

This has always bugged me and I am urged to find out how many people in the avicus community live where I do. This could also help with statistical information like where the avicus server is most popular. I want to know!

~PokerFace_Legend
body_tagged:

title: Where are da local boys!
